ingredients.ingredient: 2 (16 ounce) packages frozen crinkle-cut French fries
2 tablespoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®), or more to taste
½ teaspoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)
8 ounces white American cheese (such as Kraft® Deluxe), diced

cookingTips: Toss fries with oil and seasoning before baking for even coating
Make cheese sauce by heating milk with cheese and seasoning
Bake fries until crispy, then top with warm cheese sauce
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This elevated fries dish combines crispy texture with a creamy cheese sauce. Help the cook balance the Old Bay seasoning across both components for cohesive flavor.
